fulltext:
NGUYEN THI TRUNG HIEU (Ms) 
Binh Tan district, HCM city - Phone: (84)935 313 899 – Email: hieu.nguyenthitrung@gmail.com 
Mobile Developer (iOS Game/App Development) 
Having more than 10 years of working experience on mobile platforms, develop games and applications for iOS 
and Java (mobile) devices. Worked on numbers of projects from various domains such as PES, NBA (sport 
games), Tekken (fighting game), BebeLilly (kid game), VnExpress, LeFigaro (news apps), Urgo Digical (stock 
management and product presentation app), GoNaturist, TaoCity (travel-map apps), Innerbeans (social network), 
etc… Used to work for Japanese, French, Korean and Vietnamese IT development companies. 
•
Swift, Objective-C, X-Code

bugs)

•
Using Windows, Mac OS X

•
English (good writing, basic verbal)

Geo  Localazation  API
iOS  application  (iPhone)
Purpose :
- Think of the behavior when 
there is no internet connection 
(we should not put 100,000 POI 
in the list - the design shall 
propose a solution, e.g. only 
show the first 1000 POI, or 
force the user to use a filter, 
etc.).
- The connectivity shall be 
checked in a way that we know 
there is no connection BEFORE 
we attempt to display the map 
(so that we don't show the map 
for a few milliseconds before 
displaying the list).
The app has 2 parts :
- Map
- Implement M-Tree algorithm 
- Map ( draw direction between 
2 POI,  customization 
annotation of POI, find POI 
which is near current location 
in 10km.)
- Implement M-Tree algorithm 
(http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/
M-tree)
- Slipt and Merge POIs
